GR14ss4_krsu:1: [There are several different editions of the Kṛṣṇa-sandarbha. The Bengali
GR14ss4_krsu:2: edition appears to be earlier than the Vrindavan edition published by Haridas
GR14ss4_krsu:3: Shastri in 1983. The additions found in the Vṛ edition are probably authentic,
GR14ss4_krsu:4: as there is clear evidence Jiva Goswami made extensive corrections and
GR14ss4_krsu:5: emendations in some of his books after they were sent to Bengal with Srinivas

GR14ss4_krsu:7379: itarasyāś ca tasya sadā dvitīyāyāḥ śrī-rādhāyā eva /
GR14ss4_krsu:7381: rasasya janma prādurbhāvaḥ yāv evādi-rasa-vidyāyāḥ parama-nidhānam ity
GR14ss4_krsu:7386: ataeva sarvatopy āścarya-rūpayos tayor varṇane mama tat-kṛpaiva sāmagrīty
GR14ss4_krsu:7387: āha ādi-kavaye prathamaṃ tal-līlā-varṇanam ārabhamāṇāya mahyaṃ śrī-
GR14ss4_krsu:7390: ārambha-sama-kālam eva yugapat sarvam idaṃ mahā-
GR14ss4_krsu:7391: purāṇaṃ mama hṛdi prakāśitavān ity arthaḥ /
GR14ss4_krsu:7393: vyaktam / yad yasyāṃ ca sūrayaḥ śeṣādayo'pi muhyanti svarūpa-saundarya-
GR14ss4_krsu:7394: guṇādibhiḥ atyadbhutā keyam iti nirvaktum ārabdhā niśetuṃ na śaknuvanti /
GR14ss4_krsu:7395: evaṃ bhūtvā sā yadi kṛpāṃ nākariṣyat tadā labdha-mādhava-tādṛśa-
GR14ss4_krsu:7399: ity ādinā tasyā līlā-varṇana-leśo'pi sāhasa-siddhir asau nābhaviṣyad eveti
GR14ss4_krsu:7400: bhāvaḥ / tayor āścarya-rūpatvam eva vyanakti tejo-vāri-mṛdāṃ caitanyānām
GR14ss4_krsu:7401: api yathā yena prakāreṇa vinimayaḥ parasparaṃ svabhāva-viparyayor bhavati
GR14ss4_krsu:7411: ujjvalatā-prāptir vaṃśī-vādyādinā vārivac ca dravatā-prāptir iti /
GR14ss4_krsu:7412: tad etat sarvaṃ tasya līlā-varṇane prasiddham eva /
GR14ss4_krsu:7418: nāyikā-rūpa-tri-bhedānāṃ sarvāsām api vraja-devīnām eva prādurbhāvo vā
GR14ss4_krsu:7420: yasyāḥ saundaryādi-guṇa-sampadā tās tāḥ kṛṣṇasya na
GR14ss4_krsu:7425: vā paraspara-bhinnatāṃ gatayor aikyenaiva vivakṣitaṃ tad iti / ataeva
GR14ss4_krsu:7428: svena dhāmnā sva-sva-prabhāvena sadā nirastaṃ sva-līlā-
GR14ss4_krsu:7433: vilāsādibhir anavaratam ānanda-sandoha-dāne kṛta-satyam iva jātam / tatra
GR14ss4_krsu:7438: vācakatayā vākyato niridiṣṭa ity ubhaya-sādṛśyāvagamāt prativastūpamā-
GR14ss4_krsu:7440: iyaṃ ca muhur upamiti-mālā-prativastūpamā / tena tais
GR14ss4_krsu:7441: tair guṇair mitho yogyatayā nibaddhatvāt samanāmāpi /
GR14ss4_krsu:7443: aho parasparaṃ parasmāt param api tan-mithuna-bhūtaṃ kim api tattvaṃ mitho
GR14ss4_krsu:7444: guṇa-gaṇa-mādhurībhiḥ samatām eva samavāptam iti sakala-jīva-jīvātur-
GR14ss4_krsu:7446: vilāsaṃ na rocayatīti svataḥ sambhavi vastu vyajyate / tad āhuḥ -
GR14ss4_krsu:7448: eko'pi dharmaḥ sāmānyo yatra nirdiśyate pṛthak // [SāhD 10.49] iti /
GR14ss4_krsu:7450: evaṃ samaṃ syād ānurūpyeṇa ślāghā yogyasya
GR14ss4_krsu:7452: tathā vastu vālaṅkṛtir vāpi dvidhārthaḥ sambhavī svataḥ / kaveḥ
GR14ss4_krsu:7456: tad uktaṃ śrutyā - rādhayā mādhavo devaḥ ity ādinā /
GR14ss4_krsu:7459: aham eva paraṃ rūpaṃ nānyo jānāti kaścana /
GR14ss4_krsu:7460: jānāti rādhikā pārtha aṃśān arcanti devatāḥ // iti /
GR14ss4_krsu:7461: tayor nitya-vilāsas tv itthaṃ yathā varṇito'smad-upajīvya-caraṇāmbujaiḥ --
GR14ss4_krsu:7465: kaiśoraṃ saphalī-karoti kalayan kuñje vihāraṃ hariḥ // iti [BRS 2.1.231] /
GR14ss4_krsu:7470: tad uktaṃ śrutyā rādhayā mādhavo deva iti / etad-
GR14ss4_krsu:7471: artham eva vyatāniṣamimāḥ sarvā api paripāṭīr iti pūrṇaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GR14ss4_krsu:7483: [*ENDNOTE 1] ... ition does not have the second and fourth lines of the
GR14ss4_krsu:7486: sa hi satyam ṛtaṃ caiva pavitraṃ puṇyam eva ca
GR14ss4_krsu:7487: śāśvataṃ brahma paramaṃ dhruvaṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam
GR14ss4_krsu:7488: [*ENDNOTE 3] This portion up to the end of the paragraph is mostly
GR14ss4_krsu:7490: [*ENDNOTE 4] The second line is not found.
GR14ss4_krsu:7491: [*ENDNOTE 5] 109.53 in the critical edition. The line reads there:
GR14ss4_krsu:7493: [*ENDNOTE 6] The V. edition has kūrma-purāṇe vyāsa-gītāyāṃ sad-
GR14ss4_krsu:7494: ācāra-prasaṅge pativratā-māhātmye. Chatterjee quotes the following verse
GR14ss4_krsu:7495: from Agni Purana - sītayā rādhito vahniś chāyā-sītām ajījanat /
